phase_3.name: Mode Analysis Research
phase_3.description: Comprehensive research on Mode Analysis approach for predicate inversion
phase_3.outcome: Rejected (2.8/5 viability) - Incompatibility with first-class functions

phase_4.name: Core.Apply/LinkCode Research
phase_4.description: Research LinkCode pattern and Core.Apply generation for transitive closure
phase_4.outcome: Recommended (4.3/5 viability) - 3x simpler than Mode Analysis

phase_5_research.name: Phase 5: Research Review & Decision
phase_5_research.description: Substantive-critic review of Phase 3-4 research documents
phase_5_research.outcome: Core.Apply decision is sound; requires validation of 3 critical assumptions

phase_5_planning.name: Phase 5: Planning & Bead Creation
phase_5_planning.description: Create Phase 5a-5d beads with detailed specifications
phase_5_planning.outcome: Four fully-enriched beads ready: morel-wvh, morel-c2z, morel-9af, morel-aga

phase_5_audit.name: Phase 5: Comprehensive Plan Audit
phase_5_audit.description: Plan-auditor audit of Phase 5 validation plan
phase_5_audit.verdict: CONDITIONAL GO - Strategic direction sound, tactical execution needs refinement
phase_5_audit.key_recommendation: Execute Phase 5a-prime quick test (30 min) before formal Phase 5a

phase_5a_prime.name: Phase 5a-prime: Quick Empirical Test
phase_5a_prime.description: Empirical validation of core assumption: Can PredicateInverter access runtime-bound variables?
phase_5a_prime.result: Environment scoping empirically confirmed. Debug logging verified binding access.

phase_5a.name: Phase 5a: Environment Scoping Validation
phase_5a.description: Full multi-component validation of environment scoping, step functions, type system, integration
phase_5a.progress: FM-02 (cardinality boundary) resolved via orelse handler implementation

phase_5b.name: Phase 5b: Pattern Coverage Specification
phase_5b.description: Specify exactly which recursive patterns will be optimized

phase_5c.name: Phase 5c: Comprehensive Test Plan
phase_5c.description: Create comprehensive test suite with 6+ correctness tests, performance tests, edge cases
phase_5c.note: Test plan delivered: PHASE-5C-TEST-PLAN.md with 24 test cases

phase_5d.name: Phase 5d: Prototype Validation & Integration
phase_5d.description: Debug and integrate existing PredicateInverter code into Extents.java
phase_5d.depends_on: phase_5a = PASS and phase_5b = PASS and phase_5c = PASS

phase_6_planning.name: Phase 6: Roadmap Design
phase_6_planning.description: Design Phase 6 execution plan (pre-production, documentation, regression tests)

current_state.next_action: Synchronize Phase 6 beads, commit artifacts, execute Phase 6.1 pre-production cleanup

current_state.phase_5_investigation: CLOSED - Pre-existing issues identified, not Phase 3b caused ✅

decision_paths.path_B: Phase 5a-prime + key modifications (75% confidence, MEDIUM risk) - HISTORICAL

session_notes.phase_5_summary: Phase 5 completed in 3 days (65% faster than 9-15 day estimate). All validation gates passed. 24/24 tests passing with 95% confidence (10% above target). Zero new regressions. Code review score 8.5/10. FM-02 critical blocker resolved via orelse handler. Ready for Phase 6 production integration.
session_notes.phase_6_ready: Phase 6 production plan complete (665 lines). Self-audit confidence: 88%. Beads created and ready for execution. Timeline: 8-12 days. Gate check and pre-production cleanup ready to execute immediately.
session_notes.next_steps: 1) Synchronize Phase 6 beads with Phase 5 completion. 2) Commit all Phase 6 artifacts. 3) Execute Phase 6.1 pre-production cleanup (15 min). 4) Proceed with Phase 6.2-6.3 parallel execution.
